scripts.deploy:local: anchor deploy --program-name zk_nft --provider.cluster http://localhost:8899  --program-keypair target/deploy/program-keypair.json  --provider.wallet target/deploy/authority-keypair.json
scripts.deploy:stake:local: anchor deploy --program-name stake --provider.cluster http://localhost:8899  --program-keypair target/deploy/stake-keypair.json  --provider.wallet target/deploy/authority-keypair.json
scripts.write-buffer: solana program write-buffer --with-compute-unit-price 1000 target/deploy/zk_nft.so -u $MAINNET_RPC -k target/deploy/authority-keypair.json --buffer buffer.json --max-sign-attempts 1000 --use-rpc
scripts.write-buffer:stake: solana program write-buffer --with-compute-unit-price 1000 target/deploy/stake.so -u $MAINNET_RPC -k target/deploy/authority-keypair.json --buffer stake-buffer.json --max-sign-attempts 1000 --use-rpc
scripts.deploy: solana program deploy --with-compute-unit-price 1000 -u $MAINNET_RPC -k target/deploy/authority-keypair.json --buffer buffer.json --program-id target/deploy/program-keypair.json
scripts.deploy:stake: solana program deploy --with-compute-unit-price 1000 -u $MAINNET_RPC -k target/deploy/authority-keypair.json --buffer stake-buffer.json --program-id target/deploy/stake-keypair.json
